doclets.value:
{string|number} contact (required) - telephone number, with or without
 formatting; all non-digit characters will be stripped out

{string} className (optional) - additional space-separated class names
 to add to the link

{string} pattern (optional) - Link text format pattern, using "#" as
 the digit placeholder

{string} ariaLabel (optional) - if included, this custom aria-label
 will replace the generated aria-label

{function} onClick (optional) - function called when the link is
 clicked

{string|JSX} children (optional) - if included, this custom
 telephone link text will replace the generated text; the pattern passed in
 will be ignored

childrenComponentProp.name: contact
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
Pass a telephone number as a string, or use a known phone number in
CONTACTS. Any number with a leading "1" will be stripped off (assuming
country code). Whitespace and non-digits will be stripped out of this
string.

childrenComponentProp.name: extension
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
Options extension for the telephone number. Only include the numbers,
"ext" will be added automatically along with "extension" within the
aria-label

childrenComponentProp.name: className
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Additional class name to add to the link.

childrenComponentProp.name: pattern
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Pattern use used while formatting the contact number. Use provided PATTERNS, or create a custom one using "#" as a placeholder for each number. Note that the number of "#"'s in the pattern must equal the contact number length or an error is thrown.
